```{r}

library(psysds364data)

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
data("Goldberg_callie")
view(Goldberg_callie)
attributes(Goldberg_callie$w16activ4_2)
names(select(Goldberg_callie, contains("activ")))
?Goldberg
attributes(Goldberg_callie$w16ra)
corr.test(select(Goldberg_callie, w16activ1_2, w16activ2_2, w16activ3_2,w16activ4_2, w16activ5_2, w16activ6_2, w16activ7_2, w16activ8_2,w16activ9_2, w16activ10_2, w16activ11_2))$r
names(select(Goldberg_callie, contains("race")))
attributes(Goldberg_callie$w11Race_2)
attributes(Goldberg_callie$w14CBCLrace_1)
```
